long_description: The women's Covert Hoodie from Arc'teryx is a breathable fleece hoodie with casual, yet outstanding style. It's ideal for layering or as a stand-alone jacket. Wool-textured Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) fleece creates a stylish hooded sweater look with traditional Polartec performance. Fleece is breathable, quick-drying, warm and durable. Shaped hood provides shelter from the weather outside. Arc'teryx Covert hoodie features a full-length front zipper and stretch-knit cuffs and hem. 2 hand pockets and 1 sleeve pocket, all with laminated zippers. Flatlocked seams reduce bulk and enhance comfort; no-lift gusseted underarms keep jacket in place when arms are raised.
short_description: The women's Covert Hoodie from Arc'teryx is a breathable fleece hoodie with casual, yet outstanding style. It's ideal for layering or as a stand-alone jacket.
